{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Airlink101 |model=AR550W3G |revision= |availability= |type=mobile hotspot |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Airlink101 |default_ssid_regex=^Airlink101$ |default_ch= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}This is probably an AMIT device.
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''Airlink101'''.
